forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 18C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High near 65F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds. Low 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 18C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 64F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 13C. SSE winds at 10 to 15 km/h, increasing to 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 56F. SSE winds at 5 to 10 mph, increasing to 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. High 16C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 61F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. Low around 55F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 58F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 53F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 59F. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain likely. Low 54F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 58F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 58F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 62F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
